name: Shooty Game (ASaunders)
description:
Endless Wave shooter game.

Fight an endless number of waves for high scores.

Point and click to shoot.

Every 5 waves the upgrade totems rise, allowing you to spent your points for upgrades.

The four upgrades are:

Double turret: gives a second turret that shoots behind you.

Fire Speed: increases fire speed, can be upgraded 3 times.

Helper: adds an orbiting ship around you that insta kills any enemy ship it hits.

Dammage: reduces number of hits it takes to destroy the 2nd and 3rd type of enemy, can be upgraded 3 times.

Everything made by Alex Saunders

This game was made in 3 days for ZenoJam 3

Spent way too much time getting highscores working (I hope it works?), so I didn't get to add a bunch of things in that I wanted, such as music, more enemies, and some difficulty balance. Might do this after the jam!
